desc: State of Harmony's eco-lux milk bath collection helps you replace feelings of stress and fatigue with restorative earthy aromas and hydrating minerals to help reset your state of being.

layout.text: State of Harmony is an eco-lux milk bath that helps you replace feelings of stress and fatigue with restorative earthy aromas and hydrating minerals. Reset your state of being and practice your perfect self-care routine with our top-rated clean and natural milk bath.
